name: 0x5A17ED
description:
Concept :
The basic idea was to start from a style of music to create a game based on his style, and all this in less than 8 hours (I failed it took me ~11 hours ¯\_(ツ)_/¯).

Controls :
- Move the character with the arrows or "wasd"
- Right click to teleport
- Left click to shoot

Music by Bastien Orhan (https://soundcloud.com/borh3 & https://soundcloud.com/anagramme-2)
